text: ai kitaabavaalon! apane dharm mein had se aage na badho aur allaah se jodakar saty ke atirikt koee baat na kaho. marayam ka beta maseeh-eesa isake atirikt kuchh nahin ki allaah ka rasool hai aur usaka ek kalima hai, jise usane maramay kee or bheja tha. aur usakee or se ek rooh hai. to tum allaah par aur usake rasoolon par eemaan lao aur "teen" na kaho - baaz aa jao! yah tumhaare lie achchha hai - allaah to keval akela poojy hai. yah usakee mahaanata ke pratikool hai ki usaka koee beta ho. aakaashon aur dharatee mein jo kuchh hai, usee ka hai. aur allaah kaaryasaadhak kee haisiyat se kaafee hai
